I like eating fresh mangoes in the morning.
I like chasing komodo lizards on a private island.
Going snorkeling is my favorite thing to do.

content.text: I really enjoy cold winters and strong breezes. Do you have a favorite season?
I like all seasons, but I think my favorite is spring.
I like spring too, but I'm not a big fan of the pollen.
Yeah, I know what you mean. I have allergies too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go snorkeling, eat fresh mangoes in the morning, and chase komodo lizards on a private island.
Wow, that's sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been snorkeling, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's really fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! What's your favorite music?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to alternative and indie music.
I like alternative music too! What are some of your favorite bands?
I like The Killers, The Shins, and The National.
I like The Killers too! I've never heard of The Shins or The National, but I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're all great bands.
I will! Thanks for the recommendations.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
